column3: INSTRUCTIONS: This questionnaire will allow to your doctor to have a better understanding of the sleep-wake rhythm of your child and of any problems in his/her sleep behavior. Try to answer every question; in answering, consider each question as pertaining to the past 6 months of the child’s life. Please answer the questions by circling or striking the number 1 to 5. Thank you very much for your help.
